de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.dict.utils

Class Following

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.dict.utils.Following
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Following>

    public class Following
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Following>
    Class symbolising a following word and a preceding word/character.

    • Field Summary
